short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension determines whether a highlighted journal name is an FT-50 journal and its ABDC and ABS classification.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy to use application for business researchers. Just highlight a text in your browser that represents a journal title. Then, click on the extension or type ALT + J to obtain the journal classification/ranking according to the Financial Times 50 list, the ABDC list, and the ABS list. All the rankings are up to date up to June 2022. Note that the app is still in beta; a more robust matching algorithm will be developed in the future. 

Known issues: the application may not work well with less common font types.

Changelog: fixed issues non-trimmed journal titles
